mapper.insert: insert into DIARYTABLE (DiaryNum, DiaryUrl, DiaryTitle, DiaryIntroduce, DiaryImg, DiaryUserId, DiaryUserNickName, ThemeColor, DiaryCategory) values(diarynum_seq.nextval, #{userDiaryUrl}, 555, 666, 777, #{userID}, #{userNickname}, '#FF92BB', 999)
mapper.select: select * from DIARYTABLE dt, category ct where dt.diaryUserId = ct.categoryuserid and dt.diaryuserid = #{diaryUserId}
mapper.update: update DIARYTABLE set diaryTitle=#{diaryTitle}, diaryIntroduce=#{diaryIntroduce}, themeColor=#{themeColor} where diaryUserId=#{diaryUserId}
mapper.select: select themeColor from DIARYTABLE where diaryUserId=#{diaryUserId}
